reviews.review: The emoji movie is cinematic art I went to go see the movie thanking this movie was terrible but I was one
AN AMAZING MOVIE! CURED MY DEPRESSION

I am beyond words for this stupid flaming turd. The plot is just a laughable excuse for a story. It rips off 3 actual cinematic masterpieces since these nitwits say this is. Packed with the saddest jokes, ads, and tear inducing boredom. The emojis look like hairy horse nuts and made me look at emojis in a different way. Back off Emojis. This was 90 minutes of my life I'll never get back from this complete waste of sound and animation.The new Battlefield Earth of the decade.

i personally think that this movie is just completely and utterly disgraceful towards society in general. the fact that we had a fricking movie about EMOJIS and not something that is even remotely meaningful a made me realize that we have no hope for the future. Although the intended audience is children, i personally would not allow children to watch this disgraceful piece of shit you call a movie. 

xoxo, 
gabriella
The Emoji Movie is one of the best animated movies that i have seen in my live.I am going to give The Emoji Movie an A+

Worst film to come out after the abysmal film food fight its like every other film that's animated we want to see better films in the future so sad it came out in July 28th it is like a very bad early birthday present ?? I ended up hurting myself when I watched it please remove WORST FILM EVER
All the hate in the world will not change the fact that this could have been worse.
This in short is fucking art and anyone that says any different is an obvious troll. The emoji movie has also made such a deep impact Hollywood ????

Watching this movie is like watching a huge advertisement for outdated apps. The writers of this movie are clearly out of date with the modern world and the dialogue seems unnatural and forced. The humor is...well not very humorous. If you enjoy being bombarded by fart jokes very second then I recommend this film. The only reason I gave this one star is because of the animation, which at some points looks remarkable.
Behold ladies and gentlemen the BIGGEST cashgrab there ever was.
